positive.review: I decided to play some poker today lost everything than proceeded to play the game and lost everything again.
Its a really good game to be addicted to gambling , i really recommend it (gambling addiction is crazy on the game)

I was about to give it a thumb down, but then I started looking for a similar multiplayer game with Mahjong instead of poker, free to play or cheap, and it is virtually impossible to find any that doesn't show anime girls with microskirts and big boobs. So the Daisy Duke style hostess suddenly seems quite demure and not so sexist. I still believe they could have easily added a handsome male card dealer and it wouldn't have killed anyone. I don't like the fancy hats with camels and parrots on them, not only because they are distracting, but because all of those colours can create problems with downloads, especially if your laptop is rather old. This is particularly annoying when your character remains idle against your will, so the other players think you want to pass, but you're actually struggling with your wi-fi. A couple of words about the players, even though their behaviour is their responsibility and not a feature of the game. Some of them are clearly not interested in playing cards, but in ammassing as many coins as possible, and they do this by betting large amounts of money before the first cards are even shown. In such cases it is best to just leave the table. I have never had the impression that the game was rigged, though it is clearly designed to be addictive and encourages to use slot machines.
If I were addicted to cocaine, I would get hit less often. n
Poker is like sex if you dont have a good partner you better have a good hand.
It is easy to play anytime. I can play with my friends if I want.
The special formats are fun!
love it as a gembling addict
Great
dealer is rigged
Cool

Nobody reads my reviews anyway.
I'll throw in a recipe for Varenyky.

Recipe for Potato Dumplings (Varenyky)
Ingredients:
For the dough:
Wheat flour – 500 g
Water – 200 ml
Egg – 1
Salt – 1 tsp
For the filling:
Potatoes – 1 kg
Onions – 2
Lard or butter – 50 g
Salt – to taste
Ground black pepper – to taste
Preparation steps:
Making the dough:
Sifting the flour: Sift the flour into a large bowl.
Making the dough: Add salt and the egg to the flour. Gradually pour in the water, constantly stirring. Knead the dough until it becomes smooth and elastic.
Resting the dough: Wrap the dough in plastic wrap or cover it with a towel and let it rest for 30 minutes.
Preparing the filling:
Boiling the potatoes: Peel the potatoes, cut them into large pieces, and boil until tender in salted water.
Preparing the onions: While the potatoes are boiling, finely chop the onions. Sauté the onions in lard or butter until golden brown.
Making the potato puree: Drain the potatoes and mash them. Add the sautéed onions, salt, and pepper to taste, and mix well.
Forming the dumplings:
Rolling out the dough: Roll out the dough into a thin sheet about 2-3 mm thick. Use a glass or cutter to cut out circles approximately 7-8 cm in diameter.
Forming the dumplings: Place a spoonful of potato filling on each circle of dough. Fold the dough in half and pinch the edges tightly to seal the dumplings.
Cooking the dumplings:
Boiling water: Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add salt.
Cooking the dumplings: Gently drop the dumplings into the boiling water, stirring carefully to prevent sticking. Cook until done (approximately 5-7 minutes after they float to the surface).
Serving:
Removing the dumplings: Remove the dumplings with a slotted spoon and place them on a plate.
Serving: Serve the dumplings hot, optionally drizzling with melted butter, sour cream, or sautéed onions.
Enjoy your meal!
I decided to play some poker today lost everything than proceeded to play the game and lost everything again.
Fun mix of casual poker and MMO vibes. Easy to jump into, tons of players, and the hats give it personality. Great for quick poker sessions without taking it too seriously.
its really relaxing and fun, give it a shot
Its a really good game to be addicted to gambling , i really recommend it (gambling addiction is crazy on the game)
Very good Poker Game, that doesn't need to risk any real money, but still rewards you regurlarly.

Good for killing the time if you like playing poker/blackjack or/and if you wanna get better
6/10 (kinda the best one in it's genre)

I was about to give it a thumb down, but then I started looking for a similar multiplayer game with Mahjong instead of poker, free to play or cheap, and it is virtually impossible to find any that doesn't show anime girls with microskirts and big boobs. So the Daisy Duke style hostess suddenly seems quite demure and not so sexist. I still believe they could have easily added a handsome male card dealer and it wouldn't have killed anyone. I don't like the fancy hats with camels and parrots on them, not only because they are distracting, but because all of those colours can create problems with downloads, especially if your laptop is rather old. This is particularly annoying when your character remains idle against your will, so the other players think you want to pass, but you're actually struggling with your wi-fi. A couple of words about the players, even though their behaviour is their responsibility and not a feature of the game. Some of them are clearly not interested in playing cards, but in ammassing as many coins as possible, and they do this by betting large amounts of money before the first cards are even shown. In such cases it is best to just leave the table. I have never had the impression that the game was rigged, though it is clearly designed to be addictive and encourages to use slot machines.
Really fast game, Won tons of money but lose in just a second. T_T
